hero.title: Crafting Beautiful Smiles, Ensuring Healthier Tomorrows
hero.subtitle: Discover expert dental care that prioritizes top-quality treatments for your smile's health and beauty all at 70% more affordable costs than worldwide standards.

treatments.title: OUR TREATMENTS
treatments.subtitle: Comprehensive dental care tailored for every smile

dentalImplants.title: Dental Implants
dentalImplants.description: Dental implants are the top choice for replacing missing teeth, offering a durable, natural-looking solution.

smileMakeover.title: Smile Makeover
smileMakeover.description: It is a comprehensive cosmetic treatment that transforms your smile with a blend of procedures.

dentalVeneers.title: Dental Veneers
dentalVeneers.description: Veneers are a popular cosmetic treatment in dental tourism, ideal for achieving a flawless, bright smile.

allOnImplants.title: All-on-4/6 Implants
allOnImplants.description: Offer a fixed, full-arch solution for patients with multiple missing teeth. It provides durability and a natural look.

dentalCrowns.title: Dental Crowns
dentalCrowns.description: A popular solution for restoring damaged or weakened teeth, providing strength, and protection.

surgicalDentistry.title: Surgical Dentistry
surgicalDentistry.description: Procedures aimed at addressing complex dental issues, including extractions, gum and bone surgeries.

about.label: About Us
about.title: World-Class Dental Care, Affordable for Every Smile.
about.description: Our clinic is dedicated to providing compassionate, patient-centered care with a full range of general, cosmetic, and specialized dental treatments. We proudly offer high-quality dental solutions with globally recognized brands at costs up to 70% more affordable than standard worldwide rates.

expertise.label: EXPERTISE
expertise.title: Commitment to Excellence in Specialized Dental Care
expertise.description: Our clinic is dedicated to providing comprehensive dental expertise in every department, with multiple highly qualified specialists for all treatments. From cosmetic enhancements to complex surgical procedures, our team of expert dentists collaborates to deliver the best care for your unique needs.

features.title: Specialists for Every Need
features.description: Our team includes multiple experts across various dental fields, ensuring each patient benefits from focused expertise and personalized care. We are committed to maintaining the highest standards of treatment using advanced technology in a modern, comfortable setting.

features.title: Cutting-Edge Technology and Precision Diagnostics
features.description: From CBCT imaging to the latest in dental technology, we employ only the most advanced tools to deliver accurate diagnoses and effective treatments. Our commitment to technology allows us to achieve outstanding results with precision and efficiency.

whyUs.label: WHY CHOOSE US
whyUs.title: Exceptional Quality and Affordability
whyUs.description: Medico Clinic is dedicated to providing top-quality dental treatments using trusted global brands and high-quality materials - all at up to 70% more affordable rates than worldwide standards.

professionals.title: Experienced Professionals
professionals.description: Our team of highly skilled professionals brings extensive experience in all areas of dental care, from general dentistry to specialized treatments.

satisfaction.title: High Patient Satisfaction
satisfaction.description: Patients trust Medico Clinic for exceptional results, attentive care, and lasting impact on their smiles.

materials.title: Top-Quality Materials
materials.description: Our focus on top-grade materials guarantees that each procedure meets the highest standards of safety, longevity, and patient satisfaction.

patientJourney.label: PATIENT JOURNEY
patientJourney.title: Your Journey with Medico Clinic
patientJourney.description: Embark on a carefully crafted journey where your comfort, safety, and satisfaction come first. From a detailed online consultation to personalized treatment and dedicated post-care, every step with Medico Clinic is designed to provide a world-class experience.

slide1.title: #1 - Online Consultation
slide1.description: Begin your journey with a detailed online consultation from the comfort of your home. Our dedicated team of multilingual medical consultants is here to assist you to ensure that language is never a barrier to understanding your unique needs.

slide2.title: #2 - Arrival and Transfer
slide2.description: Upon arrival in TÃ¼rkiye, experience a warm welcome from our professional team, who will assist you with a smooth, secure transfer to your accommodation. Choose from a selection of luxurious hotels carefully curated to provide you with the comfort and relaxation you deserve.

slide3.title: #3 - Accommodation
slide3.description: Your accommodation has been selected with your comfort in mind, providing a serene and sophisticated environment for your stay. Each hotel is equipped with amenities designed to make you feel at ease, allowing you to relax and rejuvenate.

slide4.title: #4 - Clinical Consultation
slide4.description: Our dentists take the time to understand your specific goals, reviewing every detail of your customized treatment plan. With a deep commitment to precision and care, they are here to answer any remaining questions and ensure you are fully prepared and comfortable with the next steps.

slide5.title: #5 - The Procedure
slide5.description: Your treatment is conducted by highly skilled surgeons and medical professionals who use the latest technology and advanced surgical techniques to ensure optimal results.

slide6.title: #6 - Check-Up
slide6.description: Following your treatment, our team performs a thorough post-procedure check-up to ensure your comfort and satisfaction. Our experienced doctors carefully monitor your progress and address any questions or concerns.

slide7.title: #7 - Departure
slide7.description: As your journey concludes, depart with a renewed sense of confidence, knowing your experience was led by professionals who prioritize your care and comfort at every step. From your initial consultation to your final check-up, Medico Clinic is committed to delivering a seamless, exceptional experience.

testimonials.title: Real stories of exceptional care and transformative smiles

transformation.title: Stunning results that showcase the life changing impact

contact.title: Get Your FREE Dental Report

faq.title: Everything you need to know about our treatments
faq.subtitle: Find quick answers to common questions about our dental treatments, procedures, and patient care in our FAQ section.

treatments.question: What types of dental treatments do you offer?
treatments.answer: We provide a comprehensive range of dental treatments, including preventive care, cosmetic dentistry, restorative treatments, and oral surgery. Our services include dental implants, veneers, crowns, teeth whitening, orthodontics, and full smile makeovers, among others. Each treatment is tailored to meet your unique needs and help you achieve a healthier, more confident smile.

affordability.question: Are your treatments affordable compared to other countries?
affordability.answer: Yes, Medico Clinic offers top-quality dental treatments at up to 70% more affordable rates than in many other countries, without compromising on quality. We partner with globally trusted brands to ensure high standards in materials and technology, delivering excellent results at competitive prices.

rightTreatment.question: How do I know which dental treatment is right for me?
rightTreatment.answer: Our expert team will guide you through a detailed consultation and diagnostic process, using advanced technology to assess your dental health. Based on this assessment, we'll recommend the most suitable treatment options that align with your goals, whether it's improving function, aesthetics, or overall oral health.

materials.question: Do you use high-quality materials for dental treatments?
materials.answer: Absolutely. We only use top-grade materials from renowned global brands, ensuring durability, comfort, and a natural look for each treatment. Our focus on quality materials guarantees that your dental work will stand the test of time, giving you lasting results you can trust.

duration.question: How long does it take to complete dental treatments?
duration.answer: Treatment duration depends on the specific procedure and your unique needs. Some treatments, like Hollywood Smile, can be completed in a single visit, while others, like dental implants or orthodontics, may require multiple visits over a few months. Our team will provide a clear timeline during your initial consultation to help you plan accordingly.
